original_text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay, his lord commanded him to be sold, and his wife, and children, and all that he had, and payment to be made.
korean_text: 갚을 것이 없는지라 주인이 명하여 그 몸과 아내와 자식들과 모든 소유를 다 팔아 갚게 하라 하니

sentences.original_text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay,
his lord commanded him to be sold,
and his wife, and children, and all that he had,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아내와 자녀들과 그가 가진 모든 것을
